projects.title: SermonFlow Mobile App
projects.description: Full-stack mobile application using React Native and FastAPI, published to iOS App Store. Integrated OpenAI API for multi-feature sermon assistance: content expansion, biblical illustration generation, and practical application building. Built sermon management system with PDF export capabilities for pastoral workflow optimization.

projects.title: Predicting Medical Visits from GPS Mobility in the Time of COVID-19
